mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatroom_list ( chatroom_uuid, chatroom_person1_id, chatroom_person1_name, chatroom_person2_id, chatroom_person2_name ) VALUES ( #{chatroomUuid}, #{chatroomPerson1Id}, #{chatroomPerson1Name}, #{chatroomPerson2Id}, #{chatroomPerson2Name} )
mapper.select: SELECT chatroom_uuid chatroomUuid, chatroom_person1_id chatroomPerson1Id, chatroom_person1_name chatroomPerson1Name, chatroom_person2_id chatroomPerson2Id, chatroom_person2_name chatroomPerson2Name FROM chatroom_list WHERE chatroom_uuid = #{chatroomUuid}
